briefdescription.para: How many untracked objects each sentinel can track
Calculates the viewing angle offset created by a sentinel's distance from its focus body.
Calculates how long a message of any length should display using average reading speeds.

simplesect.para: The average time (in seconds) it takes to read the string.

memberdef.argsstring: (double SMA, out CelestialBody innerBody, out CelestialBody outerBody)
memberdef.name: FindInnerAndOuterBodies

briefdescription.para: Uses an arbitrary semi-major axis to determine the bodies on either side of it.

parameterdescription.para: The body to store the inner body in.
The body to store the outer body in.

simplesect.para: False if the semi-major axis falls in a weird spot.

memberdef.argsstring: (Orbit o, out CelestialBody innerBody, out CelestialBody outerBody)
memberdef.name: FindInnerAndOuterBodies

briefdescription.para: Uses semi-major axis of an orbit to determine the bodies on either side of it.

parameterdescription.para: The body to store the inner body in.
The body to store the outer body in.

simplesect.para: False if the semi-major axis falls in a weird spot.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vessel v, out CelestialBody innerBody, out CelestialBody outerBody)
memberdef.name: FindInnerAndOuterBodies

briefdescription.para: Uses semi-major axis of a vessel's orbit to determine the bodies on either side of it.

parameterdescription.para: The body to store the inner body in.
The body to store the outer body in.

simplesect.para: False if the semi-major axis falls in a weird spot.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the velocity required to escape a body at a certain altitude.

simplesect.para: The required velocity to escape the body.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the slowest velocity to possibly maintain while still in orbit of a body.

simplesect.para: The slowest velocity you can orbit the body at.

briefdescription.para: Calculates how much velocity a sentinel spawned asteroid has to work with in a prograde eccentricity burn.

simplesect.para: The amount the asteroid can "burn" without escaping the sun.

briefdescription.para: Calculates how much velocity a sentinel spawned asteroid has to work with in a retrograde eccentricity burn.

simplesect.para: The amount the asteroid can "burn" without diving into the sun.

briefdescription.para: Gets the discovery object class of a vessel, loaded or not.
Determines if a body is directly orbiting the sun.

simplesect.para: If the CelestialBody is orbiting the sun.

briefdescription.para: Chooses a random unweighted number from min-max.
Determines if a vessel is properly aligned for sentinel scanning.

simplesect.para: If the vessel is properly aligned for sentinel scanning.

briefdescription.para: Chooses a random asteroid class, weighted towards larger classes.
Chooses a random number from 0-1, weighted towards zero by WeightedStability.
Chooses a random number from min-max, weighted towards min by WeightedStability.
Chooses a random number from 0-max, weighted towards 0 by WeightedStability.
